p:
We also detected two other transmission clusters of smaller size (n = 5 and n = 4) affecting Spanish-native MSMs of another highly pathogenic variant (CRF19_cpx), which we previously reported as the first evidence of expansion of this variant outside Cuba
37 . Despite the prevalence of these CRFs remaining low in the CV, the effective expansion of these highly pathogenic HIV variants, evidenced by the detection of transmission clusters, is of especial interest because it may hamper the control of the local HIV epidemic, especially among vulnerable populations such as IDUs or MSMs.
